notes.text: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
You can now use the context menu to expand or collapse a node in a tree table
We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
We've resolved an issue with the pageReady event that occurred when a custom section included MDC tables or MDC charts
You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
We now ensure that the transition context-bound messages no longer appear once the object page is closed
We now ensure that the singletonPathVisitor annotation can be used to configure the visibility of the custom action buttons in the list report page
We now provide a scrollThreshold setting for tables
We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
The creation dialog now consistently appears over the ObjectPage when the create button is pressed in the list report
We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
